ValidationRule.description: SDT-31408-Validation created to run check on Vendor Commit Date vs Asset's Start Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AssetId__c <> null && SBQQ__RequiredBy__c = null && Vendor_Commit_Date__c <= AssetId__r.Start_Date__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Vendor Commit Date cannot be less than or equal to Asset's Start Date
